https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2tfe0PBbkR9lhNuIYY3cVOEH4iD.jpg For ten years, immigrant Tobias has worked at a Swiss clock factory and, in the relentless ticking, he saw life go by without much expectation. One day, he sees Caroline, a former schoolmate from back in Eastern Europe, and falls in love with her, but she's married and has a daughter. Brucio nel vento
